Fancy Furniture Pack

包装花哨的家具
Fancy Furniture Pack
kDesc
Finely crafted furnishings. Includes Craftsman Bench, Shield Dining Chair, Craftsman Stool, Golden Chest, Craftsman Chair, Apothecary Chest, and Fancy Circular Table.[#Legal]
Finement ouvragé mobilier. Comprend Banc artisan, Salle à manger chaise bouclier, Selles artisan, Coffre d'or, Chaise artisan, Coffre apothicaire, et Fantaisie tableau circulaire.[#Legal]
Fein gearbeitete Möbel. Beinhaltet Handwerker Bank, Esszimmerstuhl Schild, Hocker Handwerker, Gold-Truhe, Lehrstuhl für Handwerker, Apotheker Brust, und Phantasie runden Tisch.[#Legal]
Mobili finemente lavorati. Include Artigiano panchina, Sedia da pranzo scudo, Sgabello artigiano, Oro al petto, Artigiano sedia, Petto speziale, e Fancy tavolo circolare.[#Legal]
Finamente diseñado muebles. Incluye Banco de artesano, Comedor escudo silla, Taburete artesano, Oro en el pecho, Silla artesano, El pecho Boticario, y Mesa redonda de lujo.[#Legal]
細かく家具に細工された。職人ベンチ、シールドダイニングチェア、クラフツマンスツール、ゴールデンチェスト、職人の椅子、薬剤師胸、ファンシー円形のテーブルが含まれています。[#Legal]
잘게 가구를 제작. 장인 교체 멤버, 쉴드 다이닝 의자, 장인 의자, 골든 가슴, 장인 위원장, 약종상 가슴, 그리고 팬시 원형 테이블을 포함합니다.[#Legal]
Finely crafted furnishings. Includes Craftsman Bench, Shield Dining Chair, Craftsman Stool, Golden Chest, Craftsman Chair, Apothecary Chest, and Fancy Circular Table.[#Legal]
精雕细琢的家具。包括盾技工台，餐椅，技工凳，黄金胸部，技工主席，药剂师胸部，和花式圆桌。[#Legal]
精雕细琢的家具。包括盾技工台，餐椅，技工凳，黄金胸部，技工主席，药剂师胸部，和花式圆桌。[#Legal]
Finely crafted furnishings. Includes Craftsman Bench, Shield Dining Chair, Craftsman Stool, Golden Chest, Craftsman Chair, Apothecary Chest, and Fancy Circular Table.[#Legal]
